channel.title: preliminary analysis on BCHC COVID-19
channel.description: Recent content in preliminary analysis on BCHC COVID-19

item.title: Dynata Mask-Wearing Survey Analysis for BCHC Cities
item.description: Introduction Compare Estimated Mask Usage across BCHC cities (July 2 - 14) Effect of Mask Mandates on COVID-19 Methodology Dynata Dataset Mandatory Mask Policies Introduction The World Health Organization and the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommend using face masks to slow the spread of the COVID-19 virus. However, face coverings have not been as widely adopted in the US during this current epidemic as it has in previous epidemic epidemics (1918 Influenza Pandemic) or as in other countries internationally.
